topic.title: <FontDialog>
topic.p: <FontDialog/> displays a OS native font dialog.

topic.title: Input / Output Properties
topic.p: Set these properties before calling ShowDialog to create a default user input. These properties will be changed after calling ShowDialog if the user change the default input.

topic.title: SelectedFont
topic.p: This property defines the selected font. If ShowDialog returns false, the value of this property is undefined.

topic.title: SelectedColor
topic.p: This property defines the selected color. If ShowDialog returns false, the value of this property is undefined.

topic.title: Input Properties
topic.p: Set these properties before calling ShowDialog to define the content of the dialog.

topic.title: ShowSelection
topic.p: Set this property to true to highlight the SelectedFont and SelectedColor.

topic.title: ShowEffect
topic.p: Set this property to true to enable the font review area.

topic.title: ForceFontExist
topic.p: Set this property to true to ensure user cannot select an unexisting font.

topic.title: ShowDialog Method
topic.p: Call this function to display a dialog, and return true if a color is selected.
